instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Override tailwind.config.js colors with the 'colors' object defined above. Do not use default shadcn colors.
3. FONTS: Import 'Outfit', 'Manrope', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. LAYOUT: For the Dashboard, use a fixed sidebar (w-64) and a scrollable main content area. Use the 'Control Room' grid logic.
5. LANDING: Implement a 'Hero' section with the 'hero_background' image as a dark overlay (opacity-20). Use massive typography.
6. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded-xl (use rounded-sm or rounded-md) and remove white backgrounds. Everything must be dark.
7. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the 'glass' gradient and 'backdrop-blur-xl' for the Sidebar and Top Navigation.
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button and input has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
